issues.description: The problem statement asks students to implement public getters for each attribute (see tasks describing getters and setters). In the provided solution, two of these getters — getLectureName() and getNumberOfInscribedStudents() — are declared private. This is a visibility mismatch: tests and the exercise text expect these getters to be accessible (public). As written in the solution (and if the template were to provide the same signatures), students or automated tests that try to call these getters will be unable to access them, causing confusion and failing tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of the getters for lectureName and numberOfInscribedStudents to public (e.g. public String getLectureName() and public int getNumberOfInscribedStudents()). Ensure the template and solution use public getters so they match the problem description and expected tests.
